item.title: Add css.glass
item.description: https://css.glass/ - Free web app for creating glassmorphic designs using CSS.

item.title: Switch Icones to iconify.design
item.description: https://icon-sets.iconify.design/ - A collection of more than 100 icon packs with a unified interface. Allows you to search for icons across packs and export individual icons as SVGs or for popular web frameworks.

item.title: Remove Copilot from GitLab
item.description: https://github.com/features/copilot - — AI pair programmer and completion tool powered by OpenAI Codex. Provides code review, autocompletion, documentation, and refactoring. Free for students via the GitHub Student Developer Pack.

item.title: Move Copilot to GitHub section
item.description: https://github.com/features/copilot - — AI pair programmer and completion tool powered by OpenAI Codex. Provides code review, autocompletion, documentation, and refactoring. Free for students via the GitHub Student Developer Pack.

item.title: Add Poliigon
item.description:
https://itch.io/game-assets - Free/Paid assets like sprites, tile sets, character packs, ...
https://opengameart.org - OpenSource Game Assets like music, sounds, sprites, gifs, ...
https://www.poliigon.com/) - Free and paid textures (with variable resolution - Free and paid textures (with variable resolution), models, HDRIs, and brushes. Offers free plugins to export to software like Blender.

item.title: Add Icônes
item.description: https://icones.antfu.me/ - A collection of more than 100 icon packs with a unified interface. Allows you to search for icons across packs and export individual icons as links, SVGs, JSX, or for popular web frameworks.

item.title: Add Copilot
item.description: https://github.com/features/copilot - — AI pair programmer and completion tool powered by OpenAI Codex. Provides code review, autocompletion, documentation, and refactoring. Free for students via the GitHub Student Developer Pack.

item.title: Fix incorrect MAU
item.description: https://clerk.dev/ - User management, auth, 2FA/MFA with prebuilt UI components. Free up to 5,000 monthly active users.

item.title: Add Axiom
item.description: https://axiom.co/ - Store up to 0.5 TB of logs with 30 day retention. Includes integrations with platforms like Vercel and advanced data querying with email/Discord notifiers.

item.title: Rename LogDNA to Mezmo
item.description: https://www.mezmo.com/ - Free for a single user, no retention, unlimited hosts and sources

item.title: Added Glob tester
item.description: https://globster.xyz/ - — A website that allows you to design and test glob patterns. It also provides resources to learn glob patterns.
